{"welcome":"Welcome","about":"About","contact":"Contact","portfolio":"Portfolio","404 Page":"Page no found","menu":{"home":"Home","elLounge":"El Lounge","foodMenu":"Menu","latinClub":"Latin Club","eventsDay":"Events"},"menuDrink":{"home":"Home","latinClub":"Latin Club","drinksMenu":"Menu Drinks","eventsClub":"Events","visitUs":"Visit Us"},"hours":{"title":"Opening Hours","mondayLounge":"Monday: 6pm to 11pm","wednesdayLounge":"Wednesday: 6pm to 11pm","thursdayLounge":"Thursday: 6pm to 11pm","fridayLounge":"Friday: 6pm to 11pm","saturdayLounge":"Saturday: 6pm to 11pm","thursdayLatinclub":"Thursday: 11pm to 3am","fridayLatinclub":"Friday: 11pm to 3am","saturdayLatinclub":"Saturday: 11pm to 3am"},"content":{"intro_title":"Latin Fusion, Hecho en Latinoamérica ","intro_paragraph":"At El Lounge Resto-Bar, we pride ourselves on offering a Latin fusion experience like no other in Montreal. With an extensive menu inspired by the rich flavors of Colombia and Venezuela, we combine traditional dishes with a modern twist, creating a culinary journey through Latin America. Our ambiance is tropical, vibrant, and the perfect setting for a memorable evening.","index_title_second_block":"Crafted with Passion","content_title_second_block":"Our menu showcases a diverse array of Latin fusion dishes, each thoughtfully prepared to bring out the bold and authentic flavors of Latin American cuisine. Whether you're indulging in light bites or a hearty meal, our food is made to impress.","content_third_block":"We're not just a restaurant; we're a destination for cocktail lovers. Our talented mixologists are dedicated to crafting signature cocktails that elevate your dining experience. Each cocktail is a blend of Latin spirits and fresh ingredients, perfect for pairing with your meal or enjoying on its own. From tropical mojitos to our custom-made margaritas, each drink is crafted with passion.","copyright_footer":" - The Lounge / All rights reserved"},"general":{"food":"Food","drinks":"Drinks","see_more":"See more","latinClubPage":{"title":"Latin Vibes, All Night Long","intro":"When the clock strikes 11:00 PM, the party begins! El Lounge Resto-Bar transforms into a high-energy Latin nightclub, where the music pumps, the cocktails flow, and the dance floor stays packed. Whether you're looking to dance the night away or enjoy the best Latin vibes in Montreal, our club promises an unforgettable night.","content_1":[{"key":"The Ultimate Latin Party Experience"},{"key":"Signature Cocktails"},{"key":"DJ Nights"},{"key":"Live Entertainment"},{"key":"VIP Guest List, Groups & Bottle Service"}],"content_2":"Unforgettable Latin Vibes","content_3":"The energy at El Lounge is contagious, with a tropical yet vibrant ambiance that makes every night feel like a fiesta. The beats, the lights, the drinks, and the company—everything comes together to create the ultimate Latin party in Montreal. Whether you're here to dance, sip on cocktails, or simply enjoy the lively atmosphere, every moment is crafted to make sure you leave with memories that last."},"eventsClubPage":{"title":"Events and Gatherings","subtitle":"Looking for the perfect place for your next event or celebration?","content_1":"Look no further than El Lounge. Whether you're hosting an intimate gathering, a corporate event, or a birthday party, our versatile space can accommodate groups of all sizes.","content_2":"Let our dedicated team work with you to create a personalized experience that exceeds your expectations."}},"productMenu":{"dishes_title":"Plates","drinks_title":"Drinks","entrees":"Appetizers","mainDishes":"Main Dishes","sideDishes":"Side Dishes","extras":"Extras","desserts":"Desserts","cocktailsSignature":"Cocktails Signature","houseCocktails":"House Cocktails","classicCocktails":"Classic Cocktails","shots":"Shots","houseShots":"House Shots","bottles":"Bottles","wineBeerSangrias":"Wine, Sangrias & Beer","mocktails":"Mocktails","non_alcoholic":"Non alcoholic","glass":"Glass","wine":"Wine","beer":"Beer","sangrias":"Sangrias"},"food":{"menu_degustation":"1 tequeno, 1 tequechapa, 1 beef empanada, 1 pulled pork arepita, 1 ceviche, 1 pulled pork patacon. Served with chimichurri and aioli","tequenos_de_queso":"Stuffed stick with fresh cheese","tequenos_de_platano_maduro":"Sweet plantain sticks stuffed with fresh cheese","tequenos_de_jalapeno":"Golden, crispy tequeños stuffed with fresh cheese and a touch of spicy jalapeño, delivering a perfect balance of flavor and heat.","tequenos_de_guayaba":"Crispy tequeños filled with creamy fresh cheese and sweet guava, a delightful mix of savory and sweet in every bite.","tequechapa":"Stuffed corn stick with fresh cheese","trio_patacon":"3 patacones: pulled porc with green mayo. Pulled beef with cheddar cheese and garlic mayonnaise. Chicharron with guacamole","patacon_pollo":"Pulled chicken, sweet corn, lettuce, tomato, cheddar cheese with sauce aioli and plantain","patacon_chicharron":"Crispy fried plantains topped with savory chicharrón, fresh guacamole, and melted cheese—a perfect fusion of textures and flavors.","yucas_revoltosas":"Fried yuca served with our homemade spicy sauce","empanadas":"Crunchy cornmeal stuffed with aromatic beef and potatoes and Latin seasoning","ceviche_de_camaron":"Baby shrimp, pico de gallo, lime, with fried plantain chips","ceviche_de_pescado":"Healthy ceviche made with fresh fish, lime juice , cilantro and red onion","calamares":"Fresh and tender squid with lemon home-made sauce","mini_arepas":"3 arepitas: pulled porc with green mayo. Pulled beef with cheddar cheese and garlic mayonnaise. Chicharron with guacamole","wings":"Chicken wings coated in homemade BBQ sauce with a spicy kick","soup":"Chef's choice","asado_for_two":"Selection of Picanha, chicken breast, pork and chorizos, served with mixed salad, fries and yuca with mojo sauce","american_burger":"5 oz beef patty, brioche bread, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, onion accompanied by French Fries","la_pana_burger":"5 oz beef patty , brioche bread, chicken breast, fried cheddar cheese, tomato, onions, cabbage and potato chips accompanied by French Fries","la_parce_burger":"5 oz beef patty, brioche bread, sweet plantain, feta cheese, chorizo, sweet corn and avocado accompanied by French Fries","fried_chicken_burger":"Crispy fried chicken thighs topped with creamy coleslaw, fried cheese, and fresh guacamole, all finished with a crunch of potato chips for the perfect bite.","patacon_carne":"Pulled beef, lettuce and tomato, sweet corn, cheddar cheese with sauce aioli and plantain","patacon_pernil":"Pulled pork, lettuce and tomato, corn, cheddar cheese, our green mayonnaise and plantain","chicharron":"Pork belly, served with patacon, topped with pico de Gallo","grilled_chicken":"Grilled chicken breast served with fries and a house salad","arepa_de_pernil":"Pulled Pork, cheddar cheese, chorizo, and with our green mayo","arepa_de_carne":"Pulled beef, fried cheddar cheese, chorizo with our garlic mayonnaise","arepa_de_chicharron":"Pork belly, sweet plantain with guacamole","arepa_de_pollo":"Delicious arepa stuffed with stewed chicken and melted cheese","arepa_llanera":"A classic arepa loaded with tender picanha, juicy tomato slices, melted cheese, and creamy avocado, offering a taste of the plains.","poutine":"Cheese curds, fries, and poutine gravy","poutine_latino_quebecoise":"Pulled pork, pork belly, cheese curds, french fries and poutine gravy","ensalada_cesar":"Roman lettuce, house dressing, croutons and parmesan cheese
+ grilled chicken $5","salade_verte":"Tomatoes, cucumber, carrots, arcadian lettuce, and red wine dressing","extra_guacamole":"Per service","bacon":"Per service","chorizo":"Per unit","gallete_de_boeuf":"Per unit","oeuf":"Per unit","patacon":"Deep-fried green plantain slices","extra_fries":" ","yuca":" ","extra_patate_douce":" ","tres_leches":" ","quesillo":" ","tequenos_de_nutella":"Stuffed stick with nutella and vanilla ice cream"},"drinks":{"subtitle":{"el_lounge":"Strong + tropical","passion_duck":"Citric + Sweet","pasion_de_mezcal":"Strong + Fruty","medellin_mule":"Colombian and Russian fusion"},"passion_duck":"Passion Fruit, Cirka Gin, zesty lime, our secret syrup, all crowned with a splash of Tonic 1642 and a touch of Aperol, garnished with our charming duck. \"Ducktastic\".
Crafted with Cirka Gin","el_lounge":"Inspired in the core of El Lounge, performing our House Rum, Diplomático Reserva mixed with fruits like passion fruit and mango, smoked with rosemary and a hit of bitters, our must Instagramable drink... it's a MUST.
Crafted with Diplomatico reserva","smokey_melon_margarita":"Discover a bold version of the margarita with this recipe combining the sweetness of cantaloupe, smoky and spicy notes of jalapeño. This cocktail consists of fresh cantaloupe puree, 1800 Silver tequila, orange liqueur and a splash of lime juice, all served Smoked under a cloche. Ideal for those looking for a new taste experience.","patron_margarita":"Sip perfection with our Patrón Perfect Margarita at El Lounge. Crafted with fresh ingredients and Patrón Silver, it's the ultimate classic.
Lime, Passion fruit, Mango, Blue and Hibiscus
Crafted with Tequila Patron Silver","patron_margarita_tower":"lime, passion fruit, mango, strawberry, coconut, dragon fruit, blue","dragon_drop":"Enjoy a vibrant and exotic cocktail with this version of the Lemon Drop, combining the freshness of lemon and the sweetness of dragon fruit. This exquisite blend combines Greygoose vodka, triple sec, fresh lemon juice, and dragon fruit puree for a unique twist.","pasion_de_mezcal":"This Mezcalita is based on passion fruit and orange juice, great for the summer weather and start the party.","medellin_mule":"Is a Colombian variation of the famous classic Moscow Mule featuring Aguardiente, now available in Montreal! With a touch of passion fruit, ginger beer and lime. A true delight!","yuzu_melon":"A cocktail with vodka, watermelon and Yuzu (Japanese citrus fruit) is a refreshing and exotic drink. Offers a unique combination of tart, sweet and herbaceous notes, perfect for hot summer days!","patron_espresso_martini":"Kahlua, patron Silver, espresso, vermouth","mezcalita":"Mezcal, squeezed orange, lime, plain syrup","mojitos":"Flavors: Maracuyá (passion fruit), clásico (limón), fresa, cereza, coco, durazno, mango","margaritas":"Flavors: Maracuyá (passion fruit), clásico (limón), fresa,, alcohol","stella_artois":"5.0%","guinness":"4.2%","guinness_0":"0% alcohol","tinto_de_verano":"Red wine, Havana rum, triple sec, seven up, orange and banana syrup","blame_the_aperol":"Aperol, peach schnapps, passion fruit, soda, a mix of natural juices and white wine","pino_noir_bicicleta":"A fresh and elegant Pinot Noir best served with white fish, salmon, duck, and game. ","zonin_valpolicella_ripasso":"Ample and complex, with vinous tones and well-defined notes of cherry and cocoa powder","le_focaie_rocca_di_montemassi":"Intense and broad, it is expressed with pleasant notes of violet, cherry, and small red fruits","le_naturel":"The attack, rich in fresh fruit, demonstrates its provenance from high vines. Le Naturel stands out for its lightness, not without its complexity and ease of consumption.","cabolani_pinot_grigio":"The sip is fresh and juicy. Ripe fruit, golden apple, and salty notes make this wine persistent on the finish","la_hitaire_les_tours":"A delicate, refreshing wine of magnificent intensity. Floral citrus aromas with beautiful nuances of exotic fruits","la_hitaire_chardonnay":"Woody notes of fresh butter, hazelnut, and yellow peach. A very fresh, powerful, and rich attack on the palate, followed by a nice length on the finish","bourgogne_aligote":"White flower aromas with a discreet almond note. Fresh and crisp, perfect as an aperitif for a kir, this wine will also accompany fish and seafood prepared simply. Serve between 50F - 54 F.","cote_des_roses_syrah":"This wine embodies the South of France lifestyle. Fresh and fruity, this Languedoc is ideal at 10 C as an aperitif or with selfish and subtly spiced dishes.","pinot_noir_rose_bicicleta":"This fresh and vibrant Rose is ideal to enjoy slightly chilled as an aperitif or pair with salads, fish, or vegetarian dishes","zonin_prosecco":"Irresistibly intense, very fruity and aromatic","zonin_prosecco_rose":"Aromatic and fruity bouquet with rich notes of Reinette apple and red fruits, including wild strawberries","champagne_nicolas_feuillatte_reserve_exclusive":"Notes of juicy pears and crunchy apricots mingle around a fine and delicate bubble","champagne_veuve_clicquot":"Lemony richness on the nose, a struck-match character that falls in with a lemon vanilla note. Toffee apple allure on the palate with chalky coolness and a savory, nutty finish.","limonada":"Berry, Coconut, Mango, Passion Fruit, Strawberry","sherly_temple":"seven up, Granadine","conga":"Mix of juices with granadine","virgin_cocktails":"Mojito, Margarita, Piña Colada.","la_michi":"Bloody mix, nonalcoholic corona beer, Valentina, tajin, lemon, and cucumber","corona_0_":"0% alcohol","guiness_0_":" ","fin_soda_mule":" ","le_limon_fin_soda_lime_and_lemon":" ","italian_sodas":"passion fruit, mango, tangerine, strawberry","jugos":"passion fruit, mango, strawberry, lemon","varies":" ","manzana-colombiana":" ","redbull":" ","naranjada":" ","cafe":" ","espressso":" ","hot_chocolate":" "}}
